text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason where concept is-a _GenericUpdateReasonCode

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _GenericUpdateReasonCodeGenericUpdateReasonCode**Description:**Identifies why a change is being made to a record.

name: GenericUpdateReasonCode
title: GenericUpdateReasonCode
description: **Description:**Identifies why a change is being made to a record.
